info.name: Nitro type Insane updated river and mountain theme
info.description: I was bored with my old themes. So I made this one by looking at lots of things, this theme overall took a very long time to make, so I hope you enjoy. (Sorry about the bad quality of the picture, I couldn't show the whole thing, so I took a screenshot of a screenshot to see if it would work, it didn't)
info.additionalInfo: I am not going to update this since it took a long time to make, there are so many updates, and I don't really want to and don't have the time. This is the version you are stuck with. You can update it however you want
